panels.description: Number of nodes where the storage is full or down.
panels.name: Nodes storage down

panels.description:
Values show the Status code, not the number of nodes in that status.
2 = OK
panels.name: Healthy Nodes Codes
Cache Hit Rate
panels.nullValueDisplayText: No Cache stats. Pool caching must be enabled to receive these metrics.

panels.description: Values show the Status code, not the number of pools in that status.
panels.name: Pool Status

panels.description:
Values show the Status code, not the number of nodes in that status.
0 = None
1 = Init
2 = OK
3 = Offline
4 = Error
5 = Not in quorum
6 = Decommission
7 = Maintenance
8 = Storage down
9 = Storage degraded
10 = Needs reboot
11 = Storage rebalance
12 = Storage drive replace
13 = Not in quorum no storage
14 = Pool maintenance
panels.name: Nodes Error Status Code
panels.nullValueDisplayText: No nodes in a different status than 'OK'.
